name: eerie-impulse
effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
